channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12493] bash unit tests are failing
item.description: Running bats in a docker container on jenkins fails.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: In the extremely rare event that HADOOP_USER_IDENT and USER environment variables are not defined, we now fall back to use 'hadoop' as the identification string.
